testsuite.name: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: And "Student Readiness Test" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: And the content of "Question 1" with title "Assignment Navigation" is displayed
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: When I give the right responses to questions 6-8
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: And quit and save the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: When I re-login
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: And I re-open the "Student Readiness Test" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: Then the right responses are saved
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: When I modify the given responses to be wrong
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: And quit and save the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: When I re-login
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: And I re-open the "Student Readiness Test" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: Then the wrong responses are saved
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: And I save and quit assignment to clear assignment state
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: And I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-logged in

testsuite.system-out: @State @Save Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is re-opening the assignment ?[90m# assignment/StudentReadinessTest.feature:69?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI give the right responses to questions 6-8?[0m ?[90m# StudentReadinessTestSteps.respondToQuestionsSixToEightCorrectly()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mquit and save the assignment?[0m ?[90m# MapleTAAssignmentSteps.quitAndSaveAssignment()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the Class Homepage?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.assertClassHomepage()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI re-open the "?[0m?[32m?[1mStudent Readiness Test?[0m?[32m" assignment in "?[0m?[32m?[1mStudent Readiness?[0m?[32m" unit?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.reopenAssignment(String,String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mthe right responses are saved?[0m ?[90m# StudentReadinessTestSteps.assertRightResponsesOfQuestionsSixToEight()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI modify the given responses to be wrong?[0m ?[90m# StudentReadinessTestSteps.respondToQuestionsSixToEightIncorrectly()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mquit and save the assignment?[0m ?[90m# MapleTAAssignmentSteps.quitAndSaveAssignment()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI am on the Class Homepage?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.assertClassHomepage()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI re-open the "?[0m?[32m?[1mStudent Readiness Test?[0m?[32m" assignment in "?[0m?[32m?[1mStudent Readiness?[0m?[32m" unit?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.reopenAssignment(String,String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mthe wrong responses are saved?[0m ?[90m# StudentReadinessTestSteps.assertWrongResponsesOfQuestionsSixToEight()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI save and quit assignment to clear assignment state?[0m ?[90m# MapleTAAssignmentSteps.clearAssignmentState()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI am on the Class Homepage?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.assertClassHomepage()?[0m
